attributes.action: Give people the choice to have wages in wage packet instead of bank.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why can we not have the old system of salarys being put in wage packets and you do not have to use the bank if you do not want to,and people will not have to experience the unfair bank charges.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
